getAllTweets.query: { getAllTweets { id content imageURL author { id firstName lastName email profileImageURL name username image } createdAt updatedAt } }

createTweetWithoutAuth.query: mutation { createTweet(content: "Hello World!") { id content createdAt author { firstName lastName } } }

createTweetWithAuth.query: mutation { createTweet(content: "Hello World!", imageURL: "https://example.com/image.jpg") { id content imageURL createdAt author { id firstName lastName email name username } } }
